sense.gloss: to bite at, to snap at, to nibble
x: 食いつく・くいつく・1

sense.gloss: to get one's teeth into (metaphorically), to get to grips with, to really get into
x: 食いつく・くいつく・2

sdata.j: しかし↑今↑↓いま↓は、↑一目↑↓いちもく↓↑見↑↓み↓て、サメがその↑人↑↓ひと↓に|くらいつく|のは↑避↑↓さ↓けられないようだということに↑気↑↓き↓づかずにはいられない。
sdata.e: However, I can't help noticing, at this moment, that at first glance it seems inevitable that the shark will devour the man.
